data.name: ID0001
data.value: The frame must start with a '*' character.

data.name: ID0002
data.value: The frame cannot contain two consecutive '#', except when used at the end of the frame.

data.name: ID0003
data.value: The frame must end with two '#' characters.

data.name: ID0004
data.value: The value can only include digits from 0 to 9.

data.value: The parameter cannot contain two consecutive '#'.

data.value: The specified brand is not supported.

data.value: The connection has been disposed.

data.value: The protocol attached to the message isn't valid.

data.value: Action validation is only supported by Nitoo devices.

data.value: Action validation is only supported for unicast transmissions.
